WorkItem.Description:
It would be nice to have a sample of rendering PerformancePoint scorecard indicator (at least correct picture of the indicator, e.g. red/green/yellow). I've found 

BIMonitoringServiceApplicationProxy.RenderScorecard() method

that returns HTML markup and JavaScript code, from which I could extract needed indicator's data, but it's not clear how to prepare parameters for the method. Especially, parameter WebPartContext. It has a few complex properties.

The sample will be very useful! Its code will allow to render PPS indicators in SharePoint custom fields and other places.
WorkItem.Summary: Render a particular PerformancePoint scorecard indicator

Comments.Message: I meant rendering of a calculated indicator picture according to a specific value in a scorecard.
